item.title: Getting started with flowtype
item.description: Installation # Flow works best when installed per-project with explicit versioning rather than globally. Luckily, if youâ€™re already familiar with npm or yarn, this process should be pretty familiar! Add a devDependency on the flow-bin npm package: yarn add --dev flow-bin // npm install --save-dev flow-bin Run Flow: # yarn run flow // npm run flow Running the command flow init will generate a .flowconfig file within the directory that be modified as needed.
